text.content: Let's discuss the new tailwind CSS v3 and all the new shenanigans it comes along with. And why you should abandon your current CSS processor and jump on Tailwind Bandwagon!

rich_text.plain_text: Let's discuss the new tailwind CSS v3 and all the new shenanigans it comes along with. And why you should abandon your current CSS processor and jump on Tailwind Bandwagon!

text.content: tailwindcss-v3-whats-fresh

rich_text.plain_text: tailwindcss-v3-whats-fresh

text.content: Tailwind CSS 3 - What's Fresh?!
People who already use Tailwind and are looking to upgrade to the latest version 3 as well as readers who are open to switching their current CSS processor to Tailwind CSS.

rich_text.plain_text: People who already use Tailwind and are looking to upgrade to the latest version 3 as well as readers who are open to switching their current CSS processor to Tailwind CSS.

text.content: I'm an avid user of Tailwind CSS. This blog has been made with Tailwind.

rich_text.plain_text: I'm an avid user of Tailwind CSS. This blog has been made with Tailwind.

text.content: Some of the reasons I prefer it over conventional CSS and related preprocessors(like SASS, PCSS, etc.) are -

rich_text.plain_text: Some of the reasons I prefer it over conventional CSS and related preprocessors(like SASS, PCSS, etc.) are -

text.content: It is easier to maintain coherence across your website UI as you only have a limited number of predefined classes.

rich_text.plain_text: It is easier to maintain coherence across your website UI as you only have a limited number of predefined classes.

text.content: Switching between the HTML element and its corresponding CSS is a pain.

rich_text.plain_text: Switching between the HTML element and its corresponding CSS is a pain.

text.content: Ability to add new features by using plugins.

rich_text.plain_text: Ability to add new features by using plugins.

text.content: Unnoticeable to no performance tradeoffs.

rich_text.plain_text: Unnoticeable to no performance tradeoffs.

text.content: Great documentation and Community!

rich_text.plain_text: Great documentation and Community!

text.content: It's more fun than writing conventional CSS! And that's what matters the most. ?

rich_text.plain_text: It's more fun than writing conventional CSS! And that's what matters the most. ?

text.content: Tailwind CSS v3.0 has been recently released bringing incredible performance gains, workflow improvements, and a vast number of new features.

rich_text.plain_text: Tailwind CSS v3.0 has been recently released bringing incredible performance gains, workflow improvements, and a vast number of new features.

text.content: Official release video
How to install Tailwind for your current project

caption.plain_text: How to install Tailwind for your current project

text.content: Just in Time (JIT) - All the Time

rich_text.plain_text: Just in Time (JIT) - All the Time

text.content: It's the feature garnering the most amount of spotlight. JIT has been in public beta for months and is now finally battle-ready.

rich_text.plain_text: It's the feature garnering the most amount of spotlight. JIT has been in public beta for months and is now finally battle-ready.

text.content: Historically, all the classes in Tailwind had to be predefined which were then loaded onto the browser, and only then the developer was able to use them. This increased build and reload times during development as the massive CSS had to be loaded onto the browser.

rich_text.plain_text: Historically, all the classes in Tailwind had to be predefined which were then loaded onto the browser, and only then the developer was able to use them. This increased build and reload times during development as the massive CSS had to be loaded onto the browser.

text.content: You can also include the tailwind CDN via the script tag

caption.plain_text: You can also include the tailwind CDN via the script tag

text.content:
<!DOCTYPE html>
  <html lang="en">
    <head>
      <meta charset="utf-8">
      <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
      <title>Example</title>
+     <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com/"></script>
    </head>
    <body>
      <!-- -->
    </body>
  </html>

rich_text.plain_text:
<!DOCTYPE html>
  <html lang="en">
    <head>
      <meta charset="utf-8">
      <meta name="viewport" content="width=device-width, initial-scale=1.0" />
      <title>Example</title>
+     <script src="https://cdn.tailwindcss.com/"></script>
    </head>
    <body>
      <!-- -->
    </body>
  </html>

text.content: You can even add various tailwind plugins such as typography, aspect-ratio, line-clamp, etc by adding them to the cdn url

rich_text.plain_text: You can even add various tailwind plugins such as typography, aspect-ratio, line-clamp, etc by adding them to the cdn url

text.content: https://cdn.tailwindcss.com/?plugins=forms,typography,aspect-ratio,line-clamp

rich_text.plain_text: https://cdn.tailwindcss.com/?plugins=forms,typography,aspect-ratio,line-clamp

text.content: JIT compiles all of your CSSÂ

rich_text.plain_text: JIT compiles all of your CSSÂ

text.content: on-demand

rich_text.plain_text: on-demand

text.content: Â as you author your template files, instead of generating your entire stylesheet upfront. This enables Tailwind v3 to have extensive features which were not possible in previous versions. Some of these we'll discuss below.

rich_text.plain_text: Â as you author your template files, instead of generating your entire stylesheet upfront. This enables Tailwind v3 to have extensive features which were not possible in previous versions. Some of these we'll discuss below.

text.content: All Colors out of the box

rich_text.plain_text: All Colors out of the box

text.content: Since Tailwind v3 can generate CSS on-demand, there's no longer a limit on the number of colors or their variants you can use.

rich_text.plain_text: Since Tailwind v3 can generate CSS on-demand, there's no longer a limit on the number of colors or their variants you can use.

text.content: The JIT Engine also enables arbitrary values out of the box. What are those? Specific arbitrary values that are outside the design system.

rich_text.plain_text: The JIT Engine also enables arbitrary values out of the box. What are those? Specific arbitrary values that are outside the design system.

text.content: Basically, you don't need to be choosy! Everything is available!

rich_text.plain_text: Basically, you don't need to be choosy! Everything is available!

text.content: New Scroll Snap API

rich_text.plain_text: New Scroll Snap API

text.content: Tailwind v3 now comes with an in-built Snap API for scrolling behavior.

rich_text.plain_text: Tailwind v3 now comes with an in-built Snap API for scrolling behavior.

text.content: Check out the demo of Snap API in the below Playground -

rich_text.plain_text: Check out the demo of Snap API in the below Playground -

text.content: Demo of Scroll Snap API
Multi-Column Layout

rich_text.plain_text: Multi-Column Layout

text.content: This addition enables you to write text in a multi-column layout - kind of like a Newspaper. This is especially useful while designing your website's Footer. Ex:

rich_text.plain_text: This addition enables you to write text in a multi-column layout - kind of like a Newspaper. This is especially useful while designing your website's Footer. Ex:

rich_text.plain_text: Colored Box Shadows

text.content:
<button class="bg-cyan-500 shadow-lg shadow-cyan-500/50 ...">Subscribe</button>
<button class="bg-blue-500 shadow-lg shadow-blue-500/50 ...">Subscribe</button>
<button class="bg-indigo-500 shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/50 ...">Subscribe</button>

<button class="bg-indigo-500 shadow-lg shadow-indigo-500/50 ...">Subscribe</button>

text.content: Image from:Â
Tailwind website
With the new version, Tailwind now supports colored shadows. Before this, we had to create custom shadows in the Tailwind config file. Now there are predefined shadows to use.

rich_text.plain_text: With the new version, Tailwind now supports colored shadows. Before this, we had to create custom shadows in the Tailwind config file. Now there are predefined shadows to use.

rich_text.plain_text: Others

text.content: Of course, the list doesn't end so soon. There are a few other features worthy of mentioning -

text.content: Support for touch-action, will-change, flex-basis, text-indent, scroll-behavior, and more.

rich_text.plain_text: Support for touch-action, will-change, flex-basis, text-indent, scroll-behavior, and more.

text.content: Final thoughts!

rich_text.plain_text: Final thoughts!

text.content: If you have been using Tailwind CSS v2.0, it's worth every penny to upgrade to the new version. There are very few breaking changes like -

rich_text.plain_text: If you have been using Tailwind CSS v2.0, it's worth every penny to upgrade to the new version. There are very few breaking changes like -

text.content: Removed support for PostCSS v7.0 and below.

rich_text.plain_text: Removed support for PostCSS v7.0 and below.

text.content: Few classes have been renamed, like -

rich_text.plain_text: Few classes have been renamed, like -

text.content:
- <div class="overflow-clip">
+ <div class="text-clip">

- <div class="overflow-ellipsis">
+ <div class="text-ellipsis">
